name: Brain Maze
description:
Hi, here is my participation for the tri-annual game jam # 1 on the (complicated) theme: "You are your enemy"

After a crazy brainstorming to find some interesting gameplay, I opted to create a 2D dungeon crawler level with enemies, NPCs, chests and other many things to discover.                                                                                                                                                                      For the pitch, you are trapped in the maze of your brain, your main objective is to go out alive or you will end up falling into limbo. During your journey, you will cross areas of the brain, those influence the type of enemies you will have to fight.

I make this game with Construct 2 in ~ 52 hours. Graphisms don't come from me, links below, I did all the game design, level deisgn and programmation.

Some precisions: READ THE TUTORIAL, it's very important for your user experience, make sure you understand it. REPORT ME ANY BUGS, it's important, I can't test all possibilities so, you probably find a lot of bugs, the sooner you get me back as much as possible, the faster I could correct them.

In futur updates, I plan to add a real interest to coins, more levels, more types of ennemis, differents mazes, a lot so much new items and so many new things.
